name: Untitled Mobile Twin Stick Shooter Experiment
name_original: Untitled Mobile Twin Stick Shooter Experiment
description: With test graphics set, I set out to find whether this concept is anything. Can a twin stick styled top down shooter be made and be fun for multi-touch screens? Please, help me find out. Leave a comment below after a brief test, or, if you would prefer to remain anonymous, please submit a response to this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOjUk0dF069gq-pGBKi0VK9wNMGtKxcMIMjYVg... Thank you.
